actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to provide that where violations are corrected within the prescribed abatement period no penalty shall be assessed.

summary.text: Amends the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to eliminate: (1) specified enforcement procedure provisions regarding notification requirements; and (2) specified civil penalties for violations which are corrected within the prescribed abatement period.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to provide that where violations are corrected within the prescribed abatement period no penalty shall be assessed.
